title: FS: 1946 Grogan Co. Chicago White Sox team RPPC - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: 1946 Grogan Co. Chicago White Sox team RPPC - SOLD
posts.post_content:
FOR SALE:

1946 Grogan Co. Chicago White Sox team RPPC with Hall Of Famers Luke Appling and Ted Lyons. 

Has a little ink on top right front border, some toning, otherwise clean front and back. 

$30.00 postpaid 

Payment: Paypal Friends & Family - [url]venezuelantopps@hotmail.com[/url]


First post or PM get it, no emails. Thanks.
HOFer Red Faber was a coach on this team. Not exactly sure if he's in the pic as well?
